text: The President of the Regional Government of Galicia (, ), is the head of government of Galicia. The president is in charge of the executive branch of the regional government. ==List of presidents== Governments: * * * * Portrait Name Term of office Party Government Election Monarch Antonio Rosón 1978 1979 UCD Rosón Juan Carlos I José Quiroga Suárez 1979 1982 UCD Quiroga Gerardo Fernández Albor 1982 1986 AP Albor I 1981 1986 1987 Albor II 1985 Fernando González Laxe 1987 1990 PSdG– PSOE Laxe Manuel Fraga 1990 1993 PP Fraga I 1989 1993 1997 Fraga II 1993 1997 2001 Fraga III 1997 2001 2005 Fraga IV 2001 Emilio Pérez Touriño 2005 2009 PSdeG– PSOE Touriño 2005 Alberto Núñez Feijóo 2009 2012 PP Feijóo I 2009 2012 2016 Feijóo II 2012 Felipe VI 2016 2020 Feijóo III 2016 2020 Incumbent Feijóo IV 2020 ==References== *
title: President of the Regional Government of Galicia
